title: ‘Ghost in the Shell’ Goes ‘Straight Outta Compton’ With New Screenwriter
text:
‘Ghost in the Shell’ Goes ‘Straight Outta Compton’ With New Screenwriter 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
DreamWorks originally acquired the film rights to the popular Japanese manga Ghost in the Shell back in 2008 and the project has been a revo... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
